title: Will I get a good rank if I study only class 12 for the VITEEE? - Quora
tags: Vellore Institute of Technology Engineering Entrance Examination (VITEEE)

response.answer_text: I got admitted in VIT Vellore, Mechanical with Specialization in Energy Engineering in 2013, purely based on my preparation of XII syllabus. I think I have answered your question.
